Package control

Class ReservationManager

Object
ReservationManager
public class ReservationManager
extends Object
Control class to interact with both Reservation and Table entity classes as well as ReservationUI class Access infotmation from entity classes and pass information to ReservationUI boundary class to be printed out
Since:
2021-11-14
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yew Fu Yen

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ReservationManager()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static int addReservation​(String name, Date datetime, int noOfPax)
    Receives input from ReservationUI Finds a suitable empty table Assign an ID Create a new reservation instance in list of reservations Reserve the table
    static Reservation outputReservation​(int num, String type)
    Receive input from Reservation UI Search through ReservationList for the first relevant reservation
    static void outputReservation​(Reservation reservation)
    Receive reservation input from ReservationUI Fetch information from specified reservation Then pass the details to UI to be printed
    static Reservation outputReservationList​(String input, String type)
    Search through list of all reservations Compile all relevant search results Eg: All reservations under the name of XXX will be listed Pass the details to ReservationUI to be printed out Get user choice from ReservationUI to return a specific reservation
    static void outputTableList()
    This method prints the status and number of seats of all tables Then if the user chooses a table from the UI, this method fetch table details from table object and pass into UI to be printed
    static void removeExpiredReservations()
    This method calls the ReservationList to remove expired reservations
    static boolean removeReservation​(Reservation reservation)
    This method releases the table before a reservation is removed Then remove the reservation from ReservationList

    Methods inherited from class Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ReservationManager

      public ReservationManager()

  • Method Details

    • addReservation

      public static int addReservation​(String name, Date datetime, int noOfPax)
      Receives input from ReservationUI Finds a suitable empty table Assign an ID Create a new reservation instance in list of reservations Reserve the table
      Parameters:
      name - Customer name
      datetime - Date and time of reservation booking
      noOfPax - No of pax of reservation
      Returns:
      Unique ID of reservation

    • outputReservation

      public static Reservation outputReservation​(int num, String type)
      Receive input from Reservation UI Search through ReservationList for the first relevant reservation
      Parameters:
      num - Can be reservation ID or table number
      type - "ID" to search by ID, "table" to search by table number
      Returns:
      first reservation result searched

    • outputReservation

      public static void outputReservation​(Reservation reservation)
      Receive reservation input from ReservationUI Fetch information from specified reservation Then pass the details to UI to be printed
      Parameters:
      reservation - reservation to be printed

    • outputReservationList

      public static Reservation outputReservationList​(String input, String type) throws ParseException, IOException
      Search through list of all reservations Compile all relevant search results Eg: All reservations under the name of XXX will be listed Pass the details to ReservationUI to be printed out Get user choice from ReservationUI to return a specific reservation
      Parameters:
      input - Search term, can be name, date in DD/MM/YYYY format
      type - "name" to search by name, "date" to search by date, "all" to fetch all reservations
      Returns:
      reservation selected by user
      Throws:
      ParseException
      IOException

    • removeReservation

      public static boolean removeReservation​(Reservation reservation)
      This method releases the table before a reservation is removed Then remove the reservation from ReservationList
      Parameters:
      reservation - reservation object to be removed
      Returns:

    • outputTableList

      public static void outputTableList() throws IOException
      This method prints the status and number of seats of all tables Then if the user chooses a table from the UI, this method fetch table details from table object and pass into UI to be printed
      Throws:
      IOException

    • removeExpiredReservations

      public static void removeExpiredReservations()
      This method calls the ReservationList to remove expired reservations
